page.title: 08Housing
page.content: Most of the houses are stone-built. The Farms are 200-300 years old and the cottages and old vicarage 100-150 years. All have electricity and piped water from springs or mains supply. Stud Farm and Upper Lurkenhope have modern improvements (heating and electrical appliances). The Stanage Estate, which owns Stowe Farm and cottages in the village, has not carried out many improvements and two tied cottages remain empty because they lack the basic ameneties of W.C. hot water and electricity. All the other farms and cottages and the old vicarage are owner occupied. One is used as a holiday home by people living in London.
